name: Logistics Solutions Engineer / 3PL International Leader
description:
Our client is an International 3PL logistic provider, working in Russia with major players from Food Retail/FMCG/E-Commerce. Due to activity expansion, they are now seeking for experienced Logistics Solutions Engineer (Warehousing + transportation).

Job locations is Metro Dinamo (Flexibility for partial home office)

Duties:

  • Audit of logistics processes & technologies used by clients/partners
  • Analyze data of tenders for warehousing operations in the domain of retail, FMCG, cosmetics, ecommerce.
  • Define appropriate processes of operation and calculate productivities.
  • Using a calculation tool, you define the number of employees and equipment for the site as well as the costing.
  • Support R&D engineer to prepare an attractive technical offer, using innovative approach and solutions, on line with the prospect’s expectation and the client’s strategy.
  • Communicate with IT and operational department to validate new solutions.
  • Communication & reporting of the project’s status, plans, risks & corrective actions.
  • Providing information to management.

Start up of new business

  • You work with the project team to support the launching of new business.
  • You ensure that the project team implement the organization that was defined during the tender.
  • You find and contact suppliers for specific equipment.

Skills:

  • High (i.e. University graduate), preferably engineering degree.
  • Preferably additional education/courses in project management and/or in logistics, especially warehousing.
  • Good analytical mind.
  • Able to work independently as well as in the team (able to perform personal tasks remembering the link to the all team and impact on it).
  • Good level on Excel office.
  • Knowledge of Autocad is a plus.
  • Fluent in English (able to communicate with French team).
  • Ability to prioritise tasks and work under pressure
  • Oral and written communication skills
  • Flexibility and adaptability to changing workloads
  • Open minded, proactive and bright
  • Ability to work effectively as a team player
